summary: The team discussed issues with checklist management in Salesforce and AIO systems, focusing on notification spam and workflow improvements. They explored solutions for managing archived checklists and ways to better control email notifications to referral partners.
key_topics: Checklist management between Salesforce and AIO
decisions: Laura will work on giving Juan permission to delete superfluous old checklists in Salesforce
Team agreed current issues are 'nice-to-haves' rather than critical fixes

action_items.task: Implement Salesforce permission changes for checklist deletion

concerns: Multiple email notifications being sent when documents are uploaded
Lack of automated communication between Salesforce and AIO
Partners receiving notifications before checklist is ready
Limited ability to customize checklist views for different users
michael_priorities: Understanding if issues were correctly interpreted
Determining if changes were must-haves vs nice-to-haves
Exploring possibility of role-based checklist views
Finding ways to reduce notification spam

commitments.commitment: Will fix the Salesforce checklist deletion issue
